description:
This puzzle game from the creators of Dinosaur Fossil Puzzles introduces now some wild species from the old times!

Play "Restore screen" and "Dig up screen"

"Restore screen": Restoration work!
Put the collected fossil panels in order correctly.

"Dig up screen": Dig up and collect!
Break rock panels with the pickaxe.
Discover all fossil panels and take them to the Restore screen.

Challenge the 3 levels!
Two types of fossils are mixed on the level 3.
If you have an unnecessary panel, put it into the trash can.

You can discover many kinds of Prehistoric life species!
This is your next step to become an archaeologist!
name: Prehistoric Life Puzzles
